messagingConfiguration.description: The configuration link in the Privacy Requests sidebar where a user can configure a messaging provider and storage.

datasetClassificationUpdates.description: Enable per-collection dataset classification instead of bulk updates.

organizationManagement.description: Management page to configure Organization details for RoPA reporting, messaging, etc.

standaloneConnections.description: Allow the creation of standalone connections for testing

consentReporting.description: Page to download consent reports by date
